revised_title: On the Conversion of Chlorates and Nitrates into Chlorides and the Determination of Equivalent Numbers
tldr: The author investigates the conversion of chlorates and nitrates into chlorides and explores the determination of equivalent numbers for oxygen, chlorine, nitrogen, potassium, sodium, and silver. The experiments reveal discrepancies in the previously accepted equivalent numbers, leading to a reevaluation and refinement of these values.
